title: Bug 23782[Workbench] Backward/Forward buttons still operational when Close All
description: Bug 23782[Workbench] Backward/Forward buttons still operational when Close All Build 20020917.Open a .java file.Open a .class file.Use backward/forward buttons.Close all Perspectives.The backward/forward buttons are still operational.Should they be?It's abit weird to acutally use them and have nothing visually happen (other thaneditor action bars appearing when no editor is visible).
